titleStmt.title: Pirāṉmalai, X temple, time of X, year X

handDesc.p: No distinction between e and ē, nor between o and ō.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Creation of the file on the repository

div.p:
svasti śrī kōccaṭai paṉmarāṉa tribhuvaṉaccakra-vattikaḷ śrīparākrama pāṇṭiya tēvaṟku yāṇṭu 10 vatu kaṉṉi nāyaṟṟu apara pakṣattu pratamaiyum
putaṉkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa uttiraṭṭāti nāḷ teṉkō nāṭṭu nāṭum nakaramum grāmaṅkaḷōm kāraiyūr kiḻavaṉ tēvaṉāṉa kāraiyūr ve kāṇi vilai pramāṇam paṇ
ṇik kuṭutta paricāvatu iṉṉāṭṭu kūṭalūrāṉa aññūṟṟuva maṅkalattu sapai4yār eṅkaḷukku itu kaṭamai iṟukka āṟṟāteṉṟuñ colla ivvūrai
uṅkaḷukku vēṇṭiṉa iṭattē viṟṟuk koḷḷuṅkō ḷeṉṟu collukaiyil ivvūṟ pakutikku uṭaiyār māḷava cakkara-vattikaḷ kāriyattukkuk kaṭavār nīṅkaḷ
taravēṇu meṉṟu maṟikkaiyi latuk koru pōk killāta paṭiyālē ivar iṟaiyilum kāvaluṅ kaḻittu tēva tāṉamākat tiruccūla stāpanam paṇṇi
t tarak koḷvī ruḷarō veṉ ṟoru kālāvatu miru kālāvatu muk kālāvatu muṟkūṟa piṟkūṟi i kāraiyūr vēḷār koḷvē ṉeṉkaiyi livaṟku nāṅka
ḷ viṟpataṟ kicaintu viṟkiṉṟa intak kūṭalūrāṉa aiññūṟṟuvamaṅkalattu sapai4yār kāṇiyāṉa oṉṟu pātiyu mivarkaḷ pakkal muṉṉāḷ inta
kāraiyūr vēḷār koṇṭa oṉṟu pātiyu mivarkku ṅkalat tēvatāṉa
viṟkiṉṟa inta aiññūṟṟuva maṅkalattukkup peru nāṉk' ellai yāvaṉa kīḻpāṟkellai veḷḷāṟṟukkum kiḻakkum ellaikku mēṟkum teṉ
pāṟkellai kuḻikkum ellaikku vaṭakkum mēlpāṟkellai kāraikkā vellaikkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai veḷḷāṟṟukkut teṟkumāka i
cainta perunāṉkellaik kuṭpaṭṭa kuḷamum kuḷap parippum kāluṅ kālkaraiyum vayalum vayaṟ pāccum nattamum nattappāṭum puṉcaikaḷum mēṉōkkiṉa maraṅ
kaḷuṅ kīḻnōkkiṉa kiṇaṟukaḷum maṟṟum eppēṟppaṭṭa samatta prāttikaḷ paḷḷiccantam paḻantēvatānam tiruviṭaiyāṭṭam ṉīkki (i)ṟaiyi(li)
yākki viṟṟuk kuṭuttuk koḷvatāṉa eṇṇi licainta vilaipporuḷ aṉṟāṭu vaḻaṅkuṅ kuḷikai ippaṇam nūṟṟaimpatukkum vilaikkuṟa vi
ṟṟu vilaiyāvaṇak kaḷattē kāṭṭi ēṟṟi kaipporuḷaṟak koṇṭu viṟṟu vilai pramāṇam paṇṇik kuṭuttōm ippaṭi viṟṟuk kuṭutta kūṭalūrāṉa aiñ
ñūṟṟuva maṅkala nāṉkellaikkuṭpaṭṭa samasta prāttiyilum paḷḷiccantam paḻantēvatānan tiruviṭaiyāṭṭam muta
luñ cutantiraṅkaḷu muṭpaṭa inta kāraiyūr vēḷār uṭaiyār tirukkoṭuṅ-kuṉṟam-uṭaiya nāyaṉāṟku vaitta oru tirununtāviḷakku
ṇṭu oṉṟukku iṟukkum irāci 40 ippaṇam nāṟpatukkum tiruviḷakkup puṟamāka iṟaiyilum puraviluṅ kaḻittuk kuṭuttōm ippaṭi vi
ṟṟa ivvūṟku pañcupili cantuvikkiṟamam āṭtēvai veṭṭi muṭṭāvāḷ nāṭṭu viṉivōkam kāttikaip poṉ maṟṟum eppēṟpaṭṭa viṉi
yōkaṅkaḷum kaḻittuk kuṭuttu kuṭinīṅkā tēvatāṉamāka nāṉkellaiyilum tiruccūlastāpaṉam paṇṇik kuṭuttōm ippaṭikku
cantirātittavar celvatāka uṭaiyār tirukkoṭuṅ-kuṉṟam-uṭaiya nāyaṉār kōyil tirumalaiyilē kalliluñ cempilum veṭṭik
koḷḷakkaṭavarākavum ippaṭi cammatittu viṟṟu vilai pramāṇam paṇṇik kuṭuttom kāraiyūr (ki)
ḻavaṉ tēvaṉāṉa vēḷāṟkku teṉkō nāṭṭu nāṭum nakaramum grāmaṅkaḷom ivai vēḷāṉ tiruka puḷḷaṉ vaṉ eḻuttu ṭaiyāṉ eḻuttu
vai vēḷāṉ eḻuttu eḻuttu ivai niṉṟāṉ eḻuttu vai caṅkaṉ aḻakaṉ eḻuttu ivai –e kuca kkuṭi vēḷāṉ eḻuttu ivai i
vai vi ivai kurukut tu ivai tirumalai nāṭṭu vēḷāṉ eḻuttu ṅko ṉ eḻu ivai i vattu ku
lōttuṅka ttu ceyaṅkoṇṭacōḻa maṇṭalattu civantā ḷaṅko ṭṭaṉ eḻu āṅ tu
āna eḻuttu cempiya ṉ eḻuttu ivai kiḻāṉnallūr -e tava ṉ e ttā
ṟṟakuṭi eḻuttu kaṟka eḻuttu
ka kavaṉa yānampi eḻuttu
lacekara yaṉ eḻuttu cōlai paṭṭaṉ eḻuttu eḻuttu maṉṉa kka yā rumi ṉ eḻuttu
āmaikku vālavāyuṭaiyāṉ eḻuttu ttu teṉava ttu -e nārāyaṇa ṉeṉ
nāṭṭu kaṇakku ya yāṉ cūriya tēvaṉ eḻuttu viḷakku ṉatāṉata uḷ
This edition by G. Vijayavenugopal (2022). Reviewed by Emmanuel Francis (2024), based on photos (N. Ramaswamy).
